SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="4d8ee0f79c76497c896c5a89e2fded74" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Thank you so much for rescuing me the
other day![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I confess,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm really quite
flustered.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4d8ee0f79c76497c896c5a89e2fded74" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]I only came here because I heard there
were rare treasures to be found.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Getting
stuck here was NOT on my agenda![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4d8ee0f79c76497c896c5a89e2fded74" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my apologies...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal04"/]Schnauz[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] a noted
appraiser of treasures.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I often compile my
findings in a little log for posterity's sake.
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Intro_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="176337fd6a604aaeb17568a3654dc48f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]Ah,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you're interested in treasure,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] are you?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I'd love for you to take a gander at my
pride and joy...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]my Treasure Catalog![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="176337fd6a604aaeb17568a3654dc48f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]Alas,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I lost all my data while I was,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] lost myself.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="176337fd6a604aaeb17568a3654dc48f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]If you don't mind,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] would you allow me to
appraise any treasures you happen
to collect?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="176337fd6a604aaeb17568a3654dc48f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]If you do,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I shall compile the treasure data
into a neatly edited Treasure Catalog.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="176337fd6a604aaeb17568a3654dc48f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Of course,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'll offer you a reward for doing
me this favor.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] All I require is that you
keep me posted when you find something!
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_01_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="95e096b47760460bbfd558ba6dfbc733" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Tell me, how is the treasure collection
coming along?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You know, I'm MORE than
happy to appraise every valuable you find.
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="205137ef5ed84446ba8e31ddb4978af5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Why, hello.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] How are you?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The sun's shining,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
and you know what that means...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It means
it's a great day for treasure hunting!
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_02_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="9f3a7cf360d44de3a06496cd34a51bce" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Because of your efforts,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the Treasure
Catalog is coming along very nicely.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I assure you, I'm beyond grateful!
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="1528e3fb69494e91b97a77447d2a0204" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Please,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] if you will,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let me appraise as many
goodies as possible![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I tell you,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm always
excited to lay eyes upon a new treasure!
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_03_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="4b5300d575f94146923b508356e80595" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I must say,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you've collected a great deal
of treasure.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Even professional treasure
hunters would be impressed![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4b5300d575f94146923b508356e80595" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]It seems you have not only a knack for
rescuing stranded folks but for finding
precious things too.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] So multitalented!
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="f2136517939b4dc2927062e12f0f3bd9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Are those treasures?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] They are,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] aren't
they?![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Ooo,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've been waiting for them!
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_04_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="68bb303d35f54babac2288db42d130d6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]To be surrounded by this much treasure...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I feel like I must be dreaming![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="68bb303d35f54babac2288db42d130d6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]You've acquired so very many precious
items![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I have no doubt we'll collect every
bit of treasure to be found on this planet!
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_04_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="fea9b2b91517480e83bc4098ed32dd5b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The Treasure Catalog is quite substantial
now.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's such a thrill to peruse the many,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
many entries,[etc:Wait frame="15"/] don't you think?
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_05_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="bb4a5a1c3ae94026bd314025ccbb145d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Great discoveries![etc:Wait frame="8"/] What an incredible
trove of treasures you've managed
to acquire![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bb4a5a1c3ae94026bd314025ccbb145d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]It makes one almost forget the fact
one is stranded far from home and on
a very peculiar planet, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]doesn't it?
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_05_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="53ffa2251b354293b5f60d786e721127" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]It won't be long before we've collected
each and every treasure on this planet.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I'm certain of it!
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="93402a76488744b89c46ef41a62f755f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]It's happened.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] You've collected every last
treasure![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm so pleased I asked you to
assist with this endeavor that I might cry.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="93402a76488744b89c46ef41a62f755f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Here, please,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you must accept this.
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="67263ef11ba74bfc813e44ef91cb37d6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Thanks to you,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the Treasure Catalog is
now complete.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm so grateful, I'm tempted
to give you all the raw materials!
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Quest_ChildClear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="81abf34b4e864f0ab03297ab23efa095" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Ah,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you've collected quite an impressive
trove of goodies.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's humbling, really.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="81abf34b4e864f0ab03297ab23efa095" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]It isn't much,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but please accept this.
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Quest_ChildClear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="cde3daf01a69417ba4caf516c13ef1d7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Please,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] if you will,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let me appraise as many
goodies as possible![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I tell you,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm always
excited to lay eyes upon a new treasure!
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearA0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="6d52e537240846a79ab04bc43577ab67" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]What's this?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] You've already collected
each and every treasure there was
to collect?![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6d52e537240846a79ab04bc43577ab67" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]You saved me so much time and...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Eh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
never mind.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's an incredible achievement.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
You should be very proud.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6d52e537240846a79ab04bc43577ab67" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Now,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] not to rush you,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I would like to
begin the process of appraising these
fabulous finds and reward you as well.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="45096b82893e44fdbdcba579edcc04a3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Ah,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] treasure is a wonderful thing, no?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
And to have collected each and every one
of them...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]it's a dream come true, really.
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearB0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="6d4d111f0c814f489c25d94f42ed915b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHands"/]Amazing.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Truly incredible![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I didn't know
you'd already collected so many![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Please
take this as a token of my appreciation.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="371b5939e04b493086f68468e10b68b0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Why, thank you for showing me such a
precious item![etc:Wait frame="15"/] If you find more treasure,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I do hope you'll let me assess it for you.
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Intro_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="b5346224b4474f1b8a2c665e42440d1f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I miss looking at new treasures.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Really.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I'm absolutely itching to evaluate fresh
finds of great value.
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Intro_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="138f35ddc1c444ecb43549ee0ccbb693" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I could read through the Treasure Catalog
over and over.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It just never gets old,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
you know?
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Intro_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="3d94c5191c2944a8a774caa91003dc30" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Why, hello there.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The Treasure Catalog
can be found right here.
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="302c4a8a30d9459990df8abac337c235" Scale="0.9935553"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Treasures are a rarity across the universe.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
When I hear a new one's been uncovered,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I must immediately lay eyes upon it![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="302c4a8a30d9459990df8abac337c235" Scale="0.9935553"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]"Find fabulous fortunes fast!"[etc:Wait frame="8"/] That's
MY motto![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="302c4a8a30d9459990df8abac337c235" Scale="0.9935553"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]It's such a thrill to see how much these
things might sell for...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Eh, I mean,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my thirst
for treasure knowledge is unquenchable!
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="0d8bdd9776964abb98e96413b403bbfb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Do you know what a Treasure Gauge is?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It's a type of gear that reacts when
treasure is nearby.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0d8bdd9776964abb98e96413b403bbfb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Trust me—when it comes to the art
of hunting for these valuables,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it is
quite essential.
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="33919a44da704b5c92f61b46f844e16a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]A treasure's charm comes not only from
its looks but from the often surprising
ways we put it to use in our lives.
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="bf3ff76802ad41e49ec2bcf3f88c849d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]When seeking out treasures that may be
hidden or located underground,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's wise
to use a gauge to help find them.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bf3ff76802ad41e49ec2bcf3f88c849d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]The closer you get to a discovery of value,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
the more intensely it will react.
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="8f2039dfa8574bb59fdd952e2db5b781" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]One of the first treasures you found...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
It was incredible. Truly.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8f2039dfa8574bb59fdd952e2db5b781" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]The cobalt blue...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] So deep, you could go for
a swim in it![etc:Wait frame="8"/] The rounded design and the
open-and-close construction...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] So clever![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8f2039dfa8574bb59fdd952e2db5b781" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]There aren't many treasures out there
that are both beautiful and lift my
spirits so high!
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="468e182036d04e0b990942ebae50bb20" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Did you know there's an enhanced version
of the Treasure Gauge?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="468e182036d04e0b990942ebae50bb20" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]I understand it tells you the total number
of treasures in the area.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It ensures you
don't miss anything in the vicinity.
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="71ca300c8c494359bdbc92bad7fef3b8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The Treasure Catalog is brimming with my
love for rare treasures.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I hope to share it
with treasure enthusiasts the world over!
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="b82dda40274443b79d02d0b65ac4b73d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]It's terribly exciting when you finish
collecting an entire treasure series,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
don't you think?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b82dda40274443b79d02d0b65ac4b73d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]The sheer variety within some series
leaves me in awe...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And other series can be
assembled into an entirely new object![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b82dda40274443b79d02d0b65ac4b73d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]That's one of the great things about
collecting treasure...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]finding new reasons
and ways to appreciate these valuables.
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_05_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="eafcf6c886574737aff857f190e747b2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]There are some who would call these
treasures I seek nothing but junk.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="eafcf6c886574737aff857f190e747b2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Yes, yes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I know what they think
all too well.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="eafcf6c886574737aff857f190e747b2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]But please,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] consider for yourself the
incredible designs and fabulous features
exhibited by each of these unique finds![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="eafcf6c886574737aff857f190e747b2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]You'd give anything to possess them,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
wouldn't you?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I know I would![etc:Wait frame="8"/] And that
is proof enough they are treasure.
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_05_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="90a932156c7f4dfb935a4bdb53013b8d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]In my humble opinion,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] treasures are things
that enrich your very soul.
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="ef2bcbcaa42a4cf88e79d0afbbebf071" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]This planet was especially rich with
treasure, no?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] For an enthusiast like me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
it's been nothing short of bliss to be here!
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="8de93b0ee5bd4e83b98e2ebab0a81e91" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]If and when treasures are found on
another planet,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I can assure you I will
fly there straightaway.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8de93b0ee5bd4e83b98e2ebab0a81e91" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Of course,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'll be especially careful not
to get stranded.
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="e26ca52b9bc64296b974662439918c5d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Grammar:Cap/]treasures are a rarity across the universe.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
When I hear a new one's been uncovered,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I must immediately lay eyes upon it![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e26ca52b9bc64296b974662439918c5d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]"Find fabulous fortunes fast!"[etc:Wait frame="8"/] That's
MY motto![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e26ca52b9bc64296b974662439918c5d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]It's such a thrill to see how much these
things might sell for...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Eh, I mean,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my thirst
for treasure knowledge is unquenchable!
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="694a0393ea894452911350c5692e1456" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]A treasure's charm comes not only from
its looks but from the often surprising
ways we put it to use in our lives.
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="cd4b8769e6dc4922b117dafb3d701033" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]It's terribly exciting when you finish
collecting an entire treasure [Grammar:Decap/]Series,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
don't you think?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cd4b8769e6dc4922b117dafb3d701033" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]The sheer variety within some series
leaves me in awe...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And other series can be
assembled into an entirely new object![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cd4b8769e6dc4922b117dafb3d701033" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]That's one of the great things about
collecting treasure...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]finding new reasons
and ways to appreciate these valuables.
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="b2a56f4aa0d34f598a657f6dac5c3987" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]There are some who would call these
treasures I seek nothing but junk.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b2a56f4aa0d34f598a657f6dac5c3987" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Yes, yes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I know what they think
all too well.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b2a56f4aa0d34f598a657f6dac5c3987" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]But please,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] consider for yourself the
incredible designs and fabulous features
exhibited by each of these unique finds![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b2a56f4aa0d34f598a657f6dac5c3987" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]You'd give anything to possess them,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
wouldn't you?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I know I would![etc:Wait frame="8"/] And that
is proof enough they are treasure.
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="b35a741e162c45feb214a4d903eb61f8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]In my humble opinion,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] treasures are things
that enrich your very soul.
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Continue_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="c152edb81e3c431a976edbaa04cdd2db" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Please,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] when it comes to treasure,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I encourage you to talk to me anytime.
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Continue_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="01e65976298d448d9537c6b204fdad05" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]There's nothing more exciting than
treasure,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] don't you think?
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="e32c4af2ef5f40dea7faca719b087ac4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I wonder...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]if I behaved more like [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
would I be able to sniff out treasure?
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="af2d9fb983ee4524897e9c36b2266145" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Oh, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you have a good nose for
treasure,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] don't you?
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_MenuSelect_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="18ddf4ac5ca84132b6d430e0638882d1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Here's the Treasure Catalog.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Please,
do take a look.
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_MenuSelect_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="cb0b823ed4ad467c82e16947ecc51765" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Perusing the Treasure Catalog is one of
the great joys in life.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Feel free to take
your time as you look.
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Outro_A01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="a73ab2104f574dd0957bf19400d33e67" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Do drop by anytime you'd like to peruse
the Treasure Catalog.
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Outro_A02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="2"/][UE:Meta key="0863b12012dc438ba170bcb6c876690a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]You're welcome to come by anytime you'd
like to talk treasure!
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="286a9fd8bead4c26baaeb5374b136e32" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]You and I look so much alike![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm starting
to wonder which one is real![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I kid. I kid.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
Both of us are real,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm sure.
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_UnlockOlimar_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="9f6561b124b4483ba3a55c97476066a2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]To my great surprise,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] contributed
descriptions to my Treasure Catalog![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9f6561b124b4483ba3a55c97476066a2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]He provides a different perspective on
the treasures than I do.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Yes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] his entries
are well worth reading.
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_UnlockLouie_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="75c660d227f344e6ab1924785dbee481" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]What a pleasant surprise![etc:Wait frame="15"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that
delightful fellow,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] contributed descriptions
to my Treasure Catalog.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="75c660d227f344e6ab1924785dbee481" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]His entries have a unique style.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Truly they
are not to be missed.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You should give
them a read!
SV003.SV003_Area500_Talk_UnlockOlimar_Louie_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="ff4a53290081472ba03fc94d611a8126" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Both [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] AND [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] contributed
treasure descriptions to my Treasure
Catalog![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I couldn't be more thrilled.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ff4a53290081472ba03fc94d611a8126" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]They each have such a unique perspective.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
You really should read their entries not
just once but two or even three times!
